title: Jungler (P4+) LFT

embed.description: eistgleichmcc / Platinum 4 0LP / 237W 233L Win Ratio 50% / Evelynn - 138W 117L Win Ratio 54%, Hecarim - 66W 64L Win Ratio 51%, Rammus - 56W 39L Win Ratio 59%, Xin Zhao - 31W 28L Win Ratio 53%, Sejuani - 22W 23L Win Ratio 49%

body:
Hey mates,

I speak english (ok grammar) and german (nearly perfect grammar) on a proper level.
Shotcalling is something i can do in early game but I will need more competitive training to do so the whole game.
My championpool is currently (Mastery high -> low) Eve, Heca, Rammus, Cho (pref if top plays him), Sej (favorite for competitive), J4 and maybe WW.
I don't prefer a certain playstyle, teamfight or split is fine, even poke if it fits.

If you think that i might fit in your team, please hook me up ingame. We will have a talk on TS/Discord/...

See you
Johnny
